Title: The Best of Friends
Writer: Sidney Cockerell, Felicitas Corrigan, Laurentia McLachlan
Actors: John Gielgud, Wendy Hiller, Patrick McGoohan
Plot: Adapted from their letters and journals, this is a portrayal of the unique twenty-five-year friendship shared by Dame Laurentia McLachlan (Benedictine nun), Sir Sydney Cockerell (museum curator), and George Bernard Shaw (playwrigh...
